description: Main entry point for a Flutter application that sets up a simple app with a scaffold, app bar, and center content displaying a message and a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI of MyHomePage, building scaffold with app bar and body.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for MyApp and _MyHomePageState widgets.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
